summary: I  HAD. SMOKING AND HESITATION . HAD MY CAR CHECKED OUT AT ELITE AUTO REPAIR 401 736-8942. . THEY DID  A DIAGNOSTIC AND CAME UP WITH FINDING A SEVERE LEAK AT TOP OF TRANSMISSION. FOUND TRANSMISSION LEAKING FROM OIL COOLER SEAL.AT THAT TIME HE FOUND A RECALL ON THIS . I CALLED VW IN WARWICK R.I AND THEY STATED NO RECALL FOR THIS. I HAVE COPY OF RECALL PULLED AND IT WAS CLEARLY A RECALL. I AM HOPING YOU WILL REACH OUT TO ME. [XXX]  INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).'  *PM
